data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton.
In the minute 2, Southampton pushes forward through Che Adams, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Southampton close to the penalty box.
Southampton drive forward but Che Adams is judged offside.
In the minute 9, Southampton are coming forward and Theo Walcott gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Southampton.
In the minute 12, Free kick West Ham.
Southampton are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 17, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Free kick West Ham.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Southampton in the half of West Ham.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Andy Madley signals a Southampton throw-in in West Ham's half.
In the minute 28, Southampton to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in Southampton.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Southampton drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Southampton drives forward and Che Adams gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Southampton.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
In the minute 37, Southampton's Ryan Bertrand gets his shot away but it misses the target.
West Ham have a goal kick.
In Southampton, West Ham push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 39, Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Free kick West Ham.
Ryan Bertrand (Southampton) has received a yellow card from Andy Madley.
In the minute 41, West Ham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Ryan Fredericks (West Ham) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Southampton defenders.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Southampton in the half of West Ham.
In Southampton Southampton attack through James Ward-Prowse. The finish is off target, however.
Andy Madley awards West Ham a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
Andy Madley will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 45, West Ham's Manuel Lanzini breaks free at St. Mary's Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Southampton.
In the minute 46, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
West Ham needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Southampton.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 53, West Ham advance rapidly upfield but Andy Madley blows for offside.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Southampton.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Andy Madley awards the home team a throw-in.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton.
Jack Stephens of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
The home team have replaced Che Adams with Shane Long. This is the first substitution made today by Ralph Hasenhuttl.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 60, Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham make their first substitution with Said Benrahma replacing Manuel Lanzini.
West Ham's Said Benrahma misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Theo Walcott of Southampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 67, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Free kick for Southampton in the half of West Ham.
West Ham's Andriy Yarmolenko has been booked in Southampton.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Southampton's Kyle Walker-Peters gets in a shot on goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick West Ham.
West Ham's Ryan Fredericks goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 72, Moussa Djenepo (Southampton) has received a first yellow card.
David Moyes (West Ham) is making a second substitution, with Jarrod Bowen replacing Andriy Yarmolenko.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to West Ham.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 76, Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham.
Kyle Walker-Peters for Southampton has been booked by Andy Madley and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 77, Declan Rice (West Ham) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Andy Madley awards Southampton a goal kick.
Michail Antonio is replacing Sebastian Haller for the away team.
In the minute 78, West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stuart Armstrong is replacing Moussa Djenepo for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Free kick for West Ham in their own half.
Andy Madley signals a West Ham throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to West Ham.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
Said Benrahma for West Ham drives towards goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in Southampton.
Goal kick for West Ham at St. Mary's Stadium.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
West Ham have a goal kick.
Throw-in West Ham.
Free kick West Ham.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
